raw_body: SUJATHA JAGODAGE – Wife of late Chandrasoma Ranaweera of Akuressa,​ mother of Samanthi,​ mother-in-law of Jayantha Wanniarachchi (Ex – RDA),​ loving grandmother of Ruwani (Software Engineer – CMS (Pvt) Ltd),​ passed away on 2nd August. Remains lie at Chandra Panagoda Funeral Parlour Malabe. Cortege leaves on 4th August for Interment at Talahena Cemetery at 5.00 p.m.048030
